messages.subject: The Autodidact Symposium-- a gathering for self-directed learners
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings fellow unschoolers! Are you interested in self-directed learning, but unsure how it works? Do you need more guidance and support as a self-directed
messages.messageBody:
Greetings fellow unschoolers!

Are you interested in self-directed learning, but unsure how it works? Do you need more guidance and support as a self-directed learner? Do you love spending time with unschooling families and enjoying activities for all ages?
The Autodidact Symposium is taking off! Presenters and Mentors are on the books, funshops are in the works, the location is beautiful, and the focus is clear! Visit our ever-changing website to learn more about The Autodidact Symposium and register soon-- only five more months!

A registration would be a great holiday gift for you, a family or a passionate self-directed individual!

Register now at: http://theautodidactsymposium.com

Cameron Lovejoy
Director, The Autodidact Symposium
